channel.title: VPS help (Running Server)
channel.description:
I just got a VPS on wich I want to run my server on. Buy i'm having some problems with running it. When i run it, it starts to go in some kind of loop. Ill post the code of the Run.bat and a screenshot Thanks and hope you can help.
Run-Server.bat [code]@echo off title Project Insanity java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server start Run-Server.bat exit[/code]
View of vps: http://gyazo.com/2fb19d0483b5f97b471d03b6739aca3c
